items.sentence: Tom has until October 20th to finish writing the report.
Tom has written an extremely detailed report about this.
Tom is convinced Mary is the one who stole his clarinet.
I didn\'t realize that Tom wanted me to do that for him.
I didn\'t see where the ball went after it hit the tree.
I didn\'t tell Tom everything Mary asked me to tell him.
I don\'t know what Tom knows, but Tom knows what I know.
Somebody might\'ve overheard your conversation with Tom.
Sometimes, it\'s hard to tell when Tom is being serious.
I started a new blog. I\'ll do my best to keep it going.
This is the most wonderful present I have ever received.
Tom accidentally threw his thumb drive into the garbage.
Tom always tries to blame someone else for his failures.
Tom and I plan to start digging a well tomorrow morning.
We were disappointed with the results of the experiment.
When I have a lot on my mind, sometimes I forget to eat.
You won\'t be able to see anything without a flashlight.
A glass of cold water is very refreshing in hot weather.
A lot of students around the world are studying English.
A mother rabbit keeps her babies warm with her own body.
After hugging Tom, Mary picked up her suitcase and left.
Are you sure you want me to help you with your homework?
I can\'t believe you\'re taking pictures of cockroaches.
I can\'t understand why you don\'t want to eat with Tom.
I don\'t think I\'m the only one here who speaks French.
Did anything out of the ordinary happen at school today?
Everything in the world is connected to everything else.
He was absent from school yesterday because he was sick.
They\'re dimming the lights. The play is about to begin.
This is the first time I\'ve written anything in French.
I can\'t believe you didn\'t recognize your own brother.
Everyone wants to go to heaven, but nobody wants to die.
Except for Tom, everyone in the family can speak French.
Frankly speaking, his new novel is not very interesting.
French is the only foreign language I know how to speak.
What makes you think Tom hasn\'t bought the tickets yet?
What\'s a nice girl like you doing in a place like this?
What\'s the fastest way to get to the airport from here?
What\'s wrong with parading around your own house naked?
Tom tends to say the first thing that comes to his mind.
Tom thinks Mary is the most beautiful girl in his class.
Tom told me that he never wanted to work for his father.
Have you ever asked Tom why he doesn\'t like doing that?
What\'re the chances that Tom will actually get the job?
Tom and Mary went for a walk even though it was raining.
Tom and Mary were already eating dinner when I got home.
Tom and Mary were invited, so they felt obligated to go.

Tom and his friends love to get together and play music.
